name: Barbarossa
description: The two heads usually fight over who gets to kill the prey. A little instigation and the fight turns physical.

set.set_2: Upon switching to the weapon, gain **50%**/**62.5%**/**75%** damage reflection for **3** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds. Upon switching to another weapon, gain a **20%**/**25%**/**30%** damage boost for **5** seconds. Cooldown: **30** seconds.
